verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* transgression \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wicked saith within \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart, \w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* before \w his|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.

\w For|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H7130"\w* flattereth \w himself|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w his|strong="H7130"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w That|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H7130"\w* iniquity \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* found \w out|strong="H7563"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* hated.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* words \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mouth \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* deceit: \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H5869"\w* ceased \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* wise \add and\add* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6310"\w* deviseth iniquity \w upon|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H6310"\w* bed; \w He|strong="H6310"\w* setteth \w himself|strong="H7919"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H2308"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w*; \w He|strong="H6310"\w* abhorreth \w not|strong="H2308"\w* evil.

\w Thy|strong="H5921"\w* lovingkindness, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heavens; \w Thy|strong="H5921"\w* faithfulness \add reacheth\add* \w unto|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w skies|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mountains \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w Thy|strong="H3068"\w* judgments \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* great deep: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* preservest man \w and|strong="H3068"\w* beast.

How precious \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* lovingkindness, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*! \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H7227"\w* \w take|strong="H4941"\w* refuge under \w the|strong="H3068"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* wings.

\w They|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* abundantly satisfied \w with|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* fatness \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H1121"\w* house; \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w thou|strong="H4100"\w* wilt make \w them|strong="H1121"\w* drink \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* river \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H1121"\w* pleasures.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* thee \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H1004"\w* life: \w In|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H8248"\w* light \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* see light.

Oh continue \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* lovingkindness \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* know \w thee|strong="H7200"\w*, \w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* righteousness \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* upright \w in|strong="H7200"\w* heart.

Let \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* foot \w of|strong="H3820"\w* pride \w come|strong="H3045"\w* against \w me|strong="H4900"\w*, \w And|strong="H2617"\w* let \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* wicked drive \w me|strong="H4900"\w* \w away|strong="H4900"\w*.

There \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* workers \w of|strong="H3027"\w* iniquity fallen: \w They|strong="H7272"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* thrust \w down|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* not \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* rise.
